prompt: A modern living room with a warm and inviting ambiance. The room features a high ceiling, exposed wooden rafters, and white walls that contribute to the Scandinavian style floor texture. On one side of the room, there's a white wall-mounted TV set above a cozy couch. Above the couch hangs a modern light fixture that complements the overall decor. The other side of the room displays a large window with a view outside, allowing natural light to fill the space. Below this window is a wooden coffee table adorned with books and decorative items, suggesting a comfortable space for relaxation or reading. A tall potted plant adds a touch of greenery to the room, enhancing its overall aesthetic appeal. The floor texture is soft and muted, providing a contrasting element to the modern furniture pieces.
